Cases.Test case: A user with correct credentials can login
Cases.Pre-conditions: There is a valid user account
Cases.Expected Result: A user sees the account page

Scenario: Adding a product to the cart

Cases.Test case: Successfully added the product to cart from the product page
Steps: Click the Add to cart button
Cases.Expected Result: A mini cart slides out with information about the product being successfully added to the cart

Cases.Test case: Successfully added another product to the cart from the cart page and the Order Total value changed
Cases.Pre-conditions: There is a product in a cart
Steps: Compare new and old Order Total value
Expected Result: The quantity of products in the cart increased by 1
The value of the order total changed

Cases.Test case: Successfully used a discount code in the cart
Pre-conditions: There is a product in a cart
There is a valid discount code
Expected Result: The information about adding a discount code is displayed
The value of the Order Total changed
